pages.text: $(info) To use a $(thing)stone machine$(), place ingredients in the top, place fuel in the bottom, and light the bottom with a $(l:appendix/ignition)verified firestarting device$().$(p)$(info) $(thing)Stone machines$() can be doused with a bucket of water to save fuel.$(p)$(info) Regarding automation, input ingredients can be inserted into the top, or top sides, of the device, fuel into the side, and output items can be extracted from the bottom.
$(info) A $(item)Stone Crucible$() melts solids into fluids.$(p)$(warning) Filling the $(item)Stone Crucible$() with a hot fluid, like lava, will break the machine.
$(info) A $(item)Stone Kiln$() performs the same tasks as a $(item)Pit Kiln$(), but faster and with fewer failures.
$(info) A $(item)Stone Oven$() cooks food without burning it.$(p)$(info) It will also perform the same tasks as the $(item)Drying Rack$(), but faster.
$(info) A $(item)Stone Sawmill$() performs the same tasks as a $(item)Chopping Block$(), but faster.$(p)$(info) $(thing)Sawmills$() produce $(item)Wood Chips$() during operation.
